history.content:
We'll definitely get to all of you by August 19. Right now, we're working on the more immediate deadline of clearing all of your peers for graduation with their majors and minors. That means that we need to look at the record of each person who is graduating, one at a time, so it takes a little effort. We do appreciate your patience.

Warm regards,

Heather

children.subject: *because we need to declare the other 2 majors after we’re declared CS
We need to declare three majors by Aug 19, which means we need to be declared CS much sooner than that
Could you give an estimate on when we'll be declared?

history.content: Hi, for students who've submitted the declaration form, how long should we wait until we're declared? Can the process be made faster? I'm not trying to be pushy, but L&S just abruptly introduced a new overlaps policy for triple (or more) majors (as attached). As students, we would definitely prefer the old overlaps policy; thus, we want to be declared in three (or more) majors by August 19, 2020, so the old policy still applies for us. This new policy will totally ruin our plan if we're not declared triple majors by August 19, 2020. Therefore, we would really appreciate it if the declaring process can be made faster in response to this sudden change in L&S Policy.
history.subject: How long should we wait until we're declared CS? Can the process be made faster?
